name: One Tap Hurdles 2016
description:
Sprint down the track and tap to jump over the hurdles as they approach. Battle your way to the athletics finals in each of the tournaments fighting your way to Rio in Brazil for the summer games 2016.

- 7 Tournaments to compete in.
- 17 playable characters
- Challenging Game Play

Test your reactions in this fast paced racing game as you try to master dashing to become world number one. Get ready for the summer sports games with Hurdles 2016.
